#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int D_n(int n){
	int ref[] = { 0, 1, 4, 3, 8, 5, 2, 7, 6, 9 }, d = 0;
	while (n > 0){
		d += ref[n % 10];
		n = n / 10;
	}
	return d % 10;
}

long long int C_n(long long int n){
	long long int sum = 0;
	while (n>0){
		if (n % 10 == 0){
			sum += 45 * n / 10;
			return sum;
		}
		else {
			n--;
			sum += D_n(n);
			//printf("%d\n", D_n(n));
		}
	}
}
int main(){
	//freopen("test.txt", "r", stdin);
	int tc, a, b;
	long long int sum;
	scanf("%d", &tc);
	while (tc--){
		sum = 0;
		scanf("%d %d", &a, &b);
		sum = C_n(b + 1) - C_n(a);
		printf("%d\n", sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
